participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, with a passion for fitness and music.
participant_1.background: I have a dog and two cats. I like to go for runs. I play the guitar. I live by myself.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Creative and dedicated, with a strong interest in video games and family.
participant_2.background: My wife recently got laid off from her human resources job. I have been on the design team for over 65 video games. I design video games for a living. My son plays on the local football team.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a video game designer.
Wow, that's cool! What's your favorite game you've ever worked on?
I'm not sure I could pick just one, but I really enjoyed working on the last game I did.
What was it about that game that you enjoyed so much?
It was a really ambitious project, and I was proud of what we were able to achieve.
That's great! What are you working on now?
I'm not sure I can talk about that yet, but I'm excited about it.
I can understand that. What was the last game you played?
I just finished playing The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I've been playing it too.
I know, right? It's so much fun.
What's your favorite part about it?
I love the exploration. There's so much to see and do.
I know, right? It's so addictive.
I know, right? I can't stop playing it.
Me neither.
What other games do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of games. I like action games, adventure games, and puzzle games.
Me too. I like a lot of different genres too.
That's great. I'm sure we could talk about games for hours.
Me too. I'm always up for talking about games.
That's good to know. I'm always looking for new people to talk to about games.
